import React, { useState } from "react"; import styles from './PiggyBank.module.css' const PiggyBank = () => { const [collected, setCollected] = useState(200); // Поменял значение для демонстрации переполнения const [goal, setGoal] = useState(200); const progress = (collected / goal) * 100; const isFull = progress >= 100; return (

Piggy Bank

Name of the box

{collected} euro collected from {goal}
) } export default PiggyBank
